gen:link.msg:message: `ChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrent_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfChangesInValueAssetsNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
